metadata.title: CVE-2020-15503 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: LibRaw before 0.20-RC1 lacks a thumbnail size range check. This affectsdecoders/unpack_thumb.cpp, postprocessing/mem_image.cpp, andutils/thumb_utils.cpp. For example,malloc(sizeof(libraw_processed_image_t)+T.tlength) occurs withoutvalidating T.tlength.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
